Articles.Content:
Hi there. Remember that one guy who used to post here all the time about pretty much everything?

Yeah, you're looking at him, buddy.

I've gotten a new, reasonably high-end laptop, and I've been meaning to play KSP on it, but I haven't been. Might have something to do with the fact that Kingdom Hearts is my big fandom at the moment. I've been writing a ton of fanfiction, you know that? I can PM you if you like KH.

Anyway, I'm coming back, hopefully for real this time. You guys are great, and I can never bear to leave you too long. Hey, you didn't even burn the house down while I was gone this time. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So yes. The Jedi Master, master of the Mission Report, is back in action.

Welcome back Jedi Master, I wondered what had happened to you, I'm looking forwards to seeing new posts from you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ah, old Sal. I remember you. If I'm correct, you're the first guy I met on this forum. That big, friendly smiley face is always nice to see. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes, I am making this a reunion, so what?

> 
> Welcome back Jedi Master, I wondered what had happened to you, I'm looking forwards to seeing new posts from you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Is this the first time I've seen an user looking forward to other user's posts?
Welcome back. Not all that much has changed in your absence. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Even if I only know you roughly and you don't know me at all, welcome back.

> 
> Welcome back. Not all that much has changed in your absence. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Starwhip! I remember you. Love your rendezvous/docking tutorial. 

That's good. Like I said, I'm glad no one burned the house down this time. It used to feel like I couldn't leave you alone for five minutes... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Even if I only know you roughly and you don't know me at all, welcome back.

Nice to meet you, Yukon! I hope we get along well together. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

\*Howls greetings in Shyriiwook\*

> I've gotten a new, reasonably high-end laptop, and I've been meaning to play KSP on it, but I haven't been.

That ought to make things better. Welcome to the world of high part count ships!

You look familiar...

Oh yeah, you're that guy, welcome back, then.

> 
> Welcome back!

Gooddog! I'd recognize that fighter plane anywhere! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> \*Howls greetings in Shyriiwook\*
> That ought to make things better. Welcome to the world of high part count ships!

Ah, our resident Australian! \*brofist\* Good to see you're still here!

Yes, I am looking forward to the ridiculously massive ships that everyone else seems to have. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Oh yeah I remember you.

And the other Australian! Go Australia! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> You look familiar...
> Oh yeah, you're that guy, welcome back, then.

Bill! I'm afraid to say I don't recognize you, but it's nice to make your acquaintance!

***I will be downloading the game soon.***
